It Begins Here...

You play as Bucket Head, a janitor in the town Of Gehenna, saddened by his lot in life and longs to be a hero. Bucket Head must overcome dungeons and bosses empowered by powerful relics to achieve his higher calling. With his mentor ghost by his side, he just might make it.

Enjoy a charming town full with NPCs and a rich story that reveals more as time goes on. Battle through dungeons as you help Bucket Head achieve his true purpose and put an end to the Perilous Six and the Necromancer.

Together Apart is Still in development and the brief demo allows the player to get accustomed to the world environment and the mechanics going forward. A small taste of whats to come. Please consider donating if you enjoyed the demo so far.

Controls:

Movement: WSAD/ Arrow Keys

J: Interact

K: Attack Swing
